questions.question_text: Find the equation of the circle with centre (0,2) and radius 2
hints: Use the formula (x - h)^2 + (y - k)^2 = r^2

questions.question_text: Find the equation of the circle with centre (1,1) and radius sqrt(2)

questions.question_text: Find the equation of the circle with centre (-a, -b) and radius sqrt(a^2 - b^2)
